replies.body: Erm. Wait, are you suggesting you fight and have troubles against urgot often enough to want to spam ranked because he isn't enabled right now...?
Well it is the Ur-god after all

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZcnIKF8a,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-05-18T21:45:40.852+0000)
>
> Ur-god, you say?
> 
> http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/elderscrolls/images/9/9b/Dagoth-Ur.jpg?noredirect

+1 for Morrowind reference
-1 for failing to see the reason.
I said a "_proper_" reason, you dofus.
But if you don't see the reason, how can you determine if it's "proper" or not? :^)

Ayyyy lmao.

He's one of my favorite "for fun" picks honestly. And I think it's because there are so many jokes for him. I often get people complaining, saying "Ur-got to be kidding me."
I used to run {{champion:44}} & {{champion:6}} bot in norms with a friend a good amount. Was pretty fun and we generally did pretty well.

> [{quoted}](name=Lazypeon100,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZcnIKF8a,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-18T18:17:42.699+0000)
>
> Erm. Wait, are you suggesting you fight and have troubles against urgot often enough to want to spam ranked because he isn't enabled right now...?

*whoooosh*
With these boards, it was hard to tell if he was joking or not. Which I why I was asking for clarification.
Does anyone know what the bug is? I'm just curious, since no one has specified.
he was fearing people for like 3 minutes after the ult. yes champions. they basically run slowed in fear until someone kills them
Urgie-chan was too kawaii.  In fact he was so kawaii his ult fear was lasting about 1 minute.
